tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T74 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished T35 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December. Dropped from T7 following a closing 76...Earned exempt status after finishing T16 at PGA TOUR Canada Qualifying School in California...In 14 appearances on Mackenzie Tour, made four cuts, with his best showings a T17 and T19.

 2013: Played in 11 events on the Mackenzie Tour Canada, making four cuts, with two top-25 finishes, a T17 and a T19. Finished 88th on the Order of Merit...Lone PGA TOUR start came at The McGladrey Classic in late 2013 (missed cut) at Sea Island. 2012: Made five PGA TOUR starts. Had a T10 at the True South Classic, where he posted four rounds in the 60s, and a T46 in the U.S. Open...First Web.com Tour start came at the News Sentinel Open (missed cut).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Three-time Honorable Mention All-American at the University of Alabama, where he was team captain his senior season in 2011-12. All-SEC first-team selection in 2010 and second-team pick in 2012. All-SEC Freshman selection in 2009. Won four tournaments during his college career, including the NCAA Northeast Regional as a freshman and three as a sophomore...Captured the 2009 and 2010 Alabama State Amateur...Was the youngest player in the field at the 2006 U.S. Amateur at age 15...At age 13 played in the U.S. Junior Amateur.
tourBios.personal: Parents are Bill and Gail Hamrick...Has one older sister, Hayden...Attended Montgomery Academy...Biggest thrills outside of golf are duck hunting and Alabama football games...Favorite golf courses played are The Olympic Club and Merion GC...Favorite book is Lone Survivor, and his favorite music is country...Favorite athletes are Julio Jones, Mark Ingram and Eddie Lacy, and his favorite sporting events are "every Alabama game won under Coach Nick Saban."...Would like to trade places with LeBron James for a day...Dream fivesome includes Rory McIlroy, Justin Thomas, Bud Cauley and Tiger Woods...Bucket list includes high desert quail hunting, duck hunting in Canada, North Dakota and Oregon...Favorite quote comes from Marcus Luttrell, who said, "You must always strive."

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played in 21 Web.com Tour events and made 10 cuts. Had one top 25. Finished 103rd on the Regular Season money list and 123rd on the final year-long money list...Posted top-10 at the Nova Scotia Open in his 15th start in June with rounds of 70-66-68-70.

2012: Played in five PGA TOUR events, making three cuts, including recording his first top-10. Finished T10 at the True South Classic in Mississippi after shooting four sub-70 rounds (68-68-69-68)...Made his major championship appearance, qualifying for the U.S. Open. Made the cut, thanks to a second-round 67. Went on to T46 at The Olympic Club...Other made cut came at the Justin Timberlake Shriners Hospitals for Children Open (70th)...Made his Web.com Tour debut in Knoxville, Tenn., at the News Sentinel Open. Second-round 67 wasn't enough for him to make the cut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Three-time honorable mention All-American at the University of Alabama, where he was team captain in 2011-12. All-SEC first-team selection in 2010 and second-team pick in 2012. All-SEC Freshman selection in 2009...Was the youngest player in the field at the 2006 U.S. Amateur (age 15)

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T10th in 2015 at the Nova Scotia Open.
